title: Sticky chilli and mint pineapple
time: Takes 15 minutes to make, plus macerating
description: This pineapple dessert recipe adds chilli and finely chopped mint for a unique twist. Serve this easy vegan pud with whipped coconut cream.

method.Step 1: Peel, core and cut the pineapple into chunks. Sprinkle with a little caster sugar and set aside.

method.Step 2: In a pan, heat the caster sugar with the rum or water and the red chilli, finely chopped, until sticky, then add the chopped fresh mint.

method.Step 3: Heat a griddle pan and cook the pineapple, in batches, for 1-2 minutes on each side until slightly caramelised.

method.Step 4: Place in a bowl, pour over the syrup and leave to macerate until ready to serve.
